item.title: twitition - Olá @crzanini, @CasaCheiaProd e @PlanetMusicJF
item.description: #Twitition Olá @crzanini, @CasaCheiaProd e @PlanetMusicJF http://t.co/rWmK5Gng @ILiveByThomas
item.content:encoded: #Twitition Olá @crzanini, @CasaCheiaProd e @PlanetMusicJF http://t.co/rWmK5Gng @ILiveByThomas Queremos um show da Banda Restart em Juiz de Fora/MG! O último show da Banda Restart(@rockrestart) na cidade de Juiz de Fora/MG, foi no dia 04/09/2010 e nós Fãs da Banda Restart, estamos aqui mais uma vez fazendo esta petição na esperança de sermos atendidos com um show da nova tour, Geração Z. Gostaria de pedir a ajuda também da @radiocidadejf para a realização do evento. Estamos na torcida para que ocorra mais um dia de Happy Rock! Os fã clubes @ILiveByThomas, @ILiveByPeLanza e @UniaoRestartBr agradece a ajuda e a colaboração de vocês! Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: twitition.com

item.title: Powell: Bush Didn't Consult NSC On Iraq War
item.description: Colin Powell, in new book, admits the NSC never actually discussed whether going to war in Iraq was a good idea or not http://t.co/wcckoQ5V
item.content:encoded: Colin Powell, in new book, admits the NSC never actually discussed whether going to war in Iraq was a good idea or not http://t.co/wcckoQ5V WASHINGTON -- In his new book, former Secretary of State Colin Powell provides what may be the most authoritative confirmation yet that there was never a considered debate in the George W. Bush White House about whether going to war in Iraq was really a good idea. In a chapter discussing what he calls his “infamous” February 2003 speech to the United Nations where he authoritatively presented what was later exposed as gross misinformation about Iraqi weapons of mass destruction, Powell notes that by that time, war “was approaching.” Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: huffingtonpost.com

item.content:encoded: Obama REVERSES Position On Same Sex Marriage http://t.co/KfDUqpgP #tcot #sgp #phnm #ocra #twisters #tlot Obama declares support for gay marriage By Rick Klein | ABC OTUS News President Obama today announced that he now supports same-sex marriage, reversing his longstanding opposition amid growing pressure from the Link - Trackbacks

item.title: Obama: 'I Think Same-Sex Couples Should Be Able to Get Married'
item.description: http://abcnews.go.com/blogs/politics/2012/05/obama-comes-out-i-think-same-sex-couples-should-be-able-to-get-married/
item.content:encoded: http://abcnews.go.com/blogs/politics/2012/05/obama-comes-out-i-think-same-sex-couples-should-be-able-to-get-married/ President Obama today announced that he now supports same-sex marriage, reversing his longstanding opposition amid growing pressure from the Democratic base and even his own vice president. In an interview with ABC News’ Robin Roberts, the president described his thought process as an “evolution” that led him to this decision, based on conversations with his staff members, openly gay and lesbian service members, and his wife and daughters. “I have to tell you that over the course of several years as I have talked to friends and family and neighbors, when I think about members of my own staff who… Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: abcnews.go.com

item.title: Obama: Same-sex couples should have right to marry – This Just In - CNN.com Blogs
item.description: Obama: Same-sex couples should have right to marry http://t.co/hdIFPS8S
item.content:encoded: Obama: Same-sex couples should have right to marry http://t.co/hdIFPS8S President Barack Obama said in an interview with ABC that "it is important for me to go ahead and affirm that I think same-sex couples should be able to get married." With his Wednesday announcement, the president reversed his longstanding position on the issue. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: cnn.com

item.title: President Obama Announces Support For Gay Marriage
item.description: BREAKING: Obama endorses gay marriage http://t.co/Aacca0BK
item.content:encoded: BREAKING: Obama endorses gay marriage http://t.co/Aacca0BK WASHINGTON -- In a nod to a dramatic shift in public opinion, Barack Obama on Wednesday became the first sitting president to announce his support for same-sex marriage. In a sit-down interview with ABC's Robin Roberts, Obama completed what has been a markedly long and oft-mocked evolution on the matter. Link - Trackbacks

item.content:encoded: 消費者庁、ステマ行為を問題と認定--景品法の事項を一部改定 http://t.co/pAaQv0jO 最近景品法が大活躍やね ｲｲﾈ! 消費者庁は「インターネット消費者取引に係る広告表示に関する景品表示法上の問題点及び留意事項」を一部改定した。ステマへの対応を明らかにしている。 Link - Trackbacks

item.title: Twitterの大量流出したパスワードに自分のものが含まれているかどうか一発でわかる「WIWA TWIPASS」 - GIGAZINE
item.description: 流出してないようで一安心． http://t.co/zyM909UQ
item.content:encoded: 流出してないようで一安心． http://t.co/zyM909UQ * JPEG画像を簡単に無劣化で切り抜き・回転できるフリーソフト「JPEGcrop」 * 57カ国以上で飲まれる米国No.1エナジードリンクが上陸「モンスターエナジー」試飲レビュー * 本物の絵筆やブラシのようにiPadで自由自在に絵が描ける「Sensu Brush」 * Twitterの大量流出したパスワードに自分のものが含まれているかどうか一発でわかる「WIWA TWIPASS」 * スマホとカーオーディオを無線接続して音楽を再生できるFMトランスミッター「JF-BTFM2K」レビュー * 2012年5月9日のヘッドラインニュース * 新フレーバー「カウチポテト」を食べに「BEN&JERRY’S」に行くと行列が平日昼間からできまくり * JOYSOUNDの最新機種「JOYSOUND f1」は最大5動画コラボに対応、20万曲搭載で6月に発売決定 Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: gigazine.net

item.title: Twitter resists US court's demand
item.description: Twitter resists US court's demand http://t.co/FstKeFns #news
item.content:encoded: Twitter resists US court's demand http://t.co/FstKeFns #news Twitter objects to a US court order ordering it to hand over old messages posted by a Occupy Wall Street protester. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: bbc.co.uk

item.title: New light bulb to last 23 years
item.description: LED light bulb to last more than 20 years - BBC News http://t.co/MgrhQki3
item.content:encoded: LED light bulb to last more than 20 years - BBC News http://t.co/MgrhQki3 Light bulbs meant to last for more than two decades while consuming very little energy may go on sale later this year. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: bbc.co.uk
